ygData.subject: Recent changes to pets
ygData.msgSnippet: Now that pets are treated as PCs instead of NPCs when it comes to procing, I was wondering if its possible that they may now be affected by bard songs (whether
ygData.messageBody:
Now that pets are treated as PCs instead of NPCs when it comes to procing, I
was wondering if its possible that they may now be affected by bard songs
(whether intentional or unintentional on Verant's part). I haven't grouped
with a pet class since the patch that changed pets went in so I haven't been
able to test this for myself. If there are affected by bard songs now, I
would think the easiest way to confirm it is to sing Hymn or Mana song and
see if they are surrounded by blue particles. Has anyone tried this yet?

Galtin of E'ci


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
